column5: Don't you think that it's boring how people talk?
column6: Making smart with their words again,, well I'm bored
column7: Because I'm doing this for the thrill of it,, killin' it
column8: Never not chasing a million things I want
column9: And I am only as young as the minute is,, full of it
column10: Getting pumped up from the little bright things I bought
column11: But I know they'll never own me (Yeah)
column14: Baby be the class clown,, I'll be the beauty queen in tears
column15: It's a new art form showing people how little we care (Yeah)
column16: We're so happy,, even when we're smilin' out of fear
column17: Let's go down to the tennis court,, and talk it up like yeah (Yeah)
column20: Pretty soon I'll be getting on my first plane
column21: I'll see the veins of my city like they do in space
column22: But my head's filling up fast with the wicked games,,up in flames
column23: How can I fuck with the fun again,, when I'm known?
column24: And my boys trip me up with their heads again,, loving them
column25: Everything's cool when we're all in line,, for the throne
column26: But I know it's not forever (Yeah)
